languages.text: "Значит, с Маражая содрали шкуру и заставили драться в таком виде? Что ж, это немного утешает мое сердце. И радует глаз, в котором недавно еще что-то шевелилось".
"So Marazhai was skinned and made to fight like this? Well, that is a balm to my heart. And also a delight to my eyes, where something was still stirring a while ago."
languages.original_text: "Значит, с Маражая содрали шкуру и заставили драться в таком виде? Что ж, это немного утешает мое сердце. И радует глаз, в котором недавно еще что-то шевелилось".

traits.locale_text: "So Marazhai was skinned and made to fight like this? Well, that is a balm to my heart. And also a delight to my eyes, where something was still stirring a while ago."
"So Marazhai was skinned and made to fight like this? Well, that is a balm to my heart. And also a delight to my eyes, where something was still stirring a while ago."
"So Marazhai was skinned and made to fight like this? Well, that is a balm to my heart. And also a delight to my eyes, where something was still stirring a while ago."
"So Marazhai was skinned and made to fight like this? Well, that is a balm to my heart. And also a delight to my eyes, where something was still stirring a while ago."

languages.text: “也就是说，你，玛拉斋，被人活剥了皮，还不得不在这里战斗？哈，这可真让我欣慰。看着你刚刚气急败坏的样子，我的眼睛也舒服了不少。”
languages.original_text: "So Marazhai was skinned and made to fight like this? Well, that is a balm to my heart. And also a delight to my eyes, where something was still stirring a while ago."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，你，玛拉斋，被人活剥了皮，还不得不在这里战斗？哈，这可真让我欣慰。看着你刚刚气急败坏的样子，我的眼睛也舒服了不少。”

languages.text: « Marazhai a donc été écorché vif et forcé à combattre comme ça ? Eh bien, voilà qui me met du baume au cœur. Inutile de dire que c'est également un régal pour les yeux, surtout maintenant qu'ils ne me démangent plus. »
languages.original_text: "So Marazhai was skinned and made to fight like this? Well, that is a balm to my heart. And also a delight to my eyes, where something was still stirring a while ago."

traits.locale_text: « Marazhai a donc été écorché vif et forcé à combattre comme ça ? Eh bien, voilà qui me met du baume au cœur. Inutile de dire que c'est également un régal pour les yeux, surtout maintenant qu'ils ne me démangent plus. »

languages.text: «¿Desollasteis a Marazhai y le hicisteis luchar así? Es un bálsamo para mi corazón. Y una delicia para mis ojos, donde algo se retorcía no hace mucho».
languages.original_text: "So Marazhai was skinned and made to fight like this? Well, that is a balm to my heart. And also a delight to my eyes, where something was still stirring a while ago."

traits.locale_text: «¿Desollasteis a Marazhai y le hicisteis luchar así? Es un bálsamo para mi corazón. Y una delicia para mis ojos, donde algo se retorcía no hace mucho».

languages.text: 「つまり、マラズハイは皮を剥がれ、このように戦わされていたというわけか？なるほど、実に心が安らぐよ。それに、先程まで何かが中でうごめいていて、{mf|俺|私}の目も楽しませてくれた」
languages.original_text: "So Marazhai was skinned and made to fight like this? Well, that is a balm to my heart. And also a delight to my eyes, where something was still stirring a while ago."

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、マラズハイは皮を剥がれ、このように戦わされていたというわけか？なるほど、実に心が安らぐよ。それに、先程まで何かが中でうごめいていて、{mf|俺|私}の目も楽しませてくれた」

languages.text: "Marazhai wurde also gehäutet und gezwungen, so zu kämpfen? Das ist Balsam für meine Seele. Und ein Fest für meine Augen, wo sich vor einer Weile noch etwas gerührt hat."
languages.original_text: "So Marazhai was skinned and made to fight like this? Well, that is a balm to my heart. And also a delight to my eyes, where something was still stirring a while ago."

traits.locale_text: "Marazhai wurde also gehäutet und gezwungen, so zu kämpfen? Das ist Balsam für meine Seele. Und ein Fest für meine Augen, wo sich vor einer Weile noch etwas gerührt hat."

languages.text: "Marazhai'ın derisini soyup o şekilde dövüşmeye zorlamışlar, öyle mi? Açıkçası bunu duyunca içime su serpildi. Daha yeni bir şey karıştırılan gözlerim de bayram etti."
languages.original_text: "So Marazhai was skinned and made to fight like this? Well, that is a balm to my heart. And also a delight to my eyes, where something was still stirring a while ago."

traits.locale_text: "Demek Marazhai'ın derisini soyup o şekilde dövüşmeye zorlamışlar? Açıkçası bunu duyunca içime su serpildi. Daha yeni karıştırılan gözlerim de bayram etti."
